name: fullstack_app
description: React and express app to try things out

scripts.build: npm --prefix client run build --prod && npm --prefix api run build
scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix client install && npm --prefix api install
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "cd api && npm run dev" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.test: concurrently --kill-others "cd api && npm run start:test" "cd client && npm start" "cypress run"
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
